articles.description: Seahawks WR Josh Gordon may have lost his final chance at resurrecting his NFL career thanks a knockout blow by Roger Goodell.
articles.content:
A month ago, Josh Gordon seemed on track to return to the Seattle Seahawks. 
Now, his NFL career might be over. 
For a player with such rare physical skills, Gordon has such little to show for it. … [+4551 chars]
